sentences.sContent: This is why display cases are rarely found in the world of digital typography, whereas they were once common in letterpress printing.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is why display cases are rarely found in the world of digital typography, whereas they were once common in letterpress printing.
sentences.sCn: 这就是当今数字化排印领域中罕见特排字体的原因，虽然它们在凸版印刷的时代盛行一时。

words.tran: 排印错误；排字工；印刷工

trans.tranCn: 凸版印刷术, 排印印刷样式
trans.tranOther: the work of preparing written material for printing
